授業目的: To build on students' speaking and listening skills, improve vocabulary and enhance self-expression in English. To give the students the basic skills and training in giving presentations.
到達目標: Students should have a reached a higher level of communication competence, and must be able to express themselves confidently in a natural manner. Students should be able to give a short presentation on a variety of topics related to general themes
授業方法:
-Pair and small group discussion
-Oral presentations (individual and small group)

第1回: Class introduction: On demand tasks need to be completed. These can be found on the class edmodo site. There will also be a zoom meeting, details were sent by email and can also be found in class announcements.
第9回: Explaining the steps of a process
トピック.授業外学習2: You will be given homework every week. Be sure to review each lesson and prepare for the next class. Keep trying and progress will come. Nothing ventured, nothing gained.
